thread.title: Patricia Sowa
thread.title_full: Otticanet recensione scritta da Patricia Sowa

author: Patricia Sowa
title: Patricia Sowa
text: I live in the USA and didn't realize when I ordered the glasses that they were coming from Italy till I got my tracking number. I figured it would be weeks before I received my item but they came in days. Very pleased. The glasses arrived here quickly and in great new condition. I would definitely buy from them again. Thank you
